translation.QuemSouEu: Hello, I'm Josué Carvalho and I'm a FullStack Developer.
translation.SobreP1: My name is Josué Carvalho, I'm a career-transitioning front-end developer, 22 years old, and I have advanced English skills. Currently, I'm focused on enhancing my skills in React JS, one of the leading JavaScript libraries for user interface development.
translation.SobreP2: Full stack developer with comprehensive experience in Node.js, TypeScript, and React. My skills encompass development on both the server and user interface sides, enabling me to create integrated and efficient solutions. I am committed to continually improving my technical competencies, seeking challenging opportunities to contribute my expertise to innovative projects.
translation.Teste técnico da empresa MKS Sistemas, u: Technical testing by MKS Sistemas, using React, Typescript, styled-components, react-query, react-helmet and react-router-dom.
translation.Front end completo de um sistema de cata: Complete front end of a catalog system developed in React.js along with typescript and using the following libraries: React Router, Context API, custom hooks, Axios, js-cookies and many other resources.
translation.A CatalogoAPI é uma API Node.js com Expr: CatalogoAPI is a Node.js API with Express that offers secure authentication, email sending, validation, storage in AWS S3 and MongoDB to manage a single catalog securely and efficiently.
translation.Backend desenvolvido em NodeJS com o fra: Backend developed in Node.js with the Express.js framework for the task manager app. The backend consists of an authentication system where, after the user creates their account, they can use the app to manage their tasks.
translation.O TaskManager é uma poderosa ferramenta: The TaskManager is a powerful task management tool that allows users to create user profiles, efficiently add, edit, delete, and manage tasks. With an intuitive interface, this application simplifies your daily organization, ensuring you're always in control of your responsibilities.
translation.O profile card foi meu primeiro projeto: The profile card was my first project using HTML and CSS3 during the period when I was learning more about markup languages.
translation.A Pokedex desenvolvida durante o curso d: The Pokedex developed during the JavaScript training course is an application that features a home page with the first 10 Pokémon and a button that loads an additional 5 Pokémon with each click. Each card displays the Pokémon's type and ability, providing trainers with an overview of each Pokémon's basic information.
translation.Um aplicativo React.js com Firebase para: A React.js application with Firebase for creating, editing, deleting, and managing blog posts, including user authentication. Simplify the creation and management of your personal blog.
translation.A página web 'JC Soluções' é uma platafo: The 'JC Soluções' website is a comprehensive and informative platform created to showcase my work as an IT professional and promote my services as a developer. With an appealing design, it showcases a variety of recent projects and provides detailed information about my services.
translation.Um aplicativo para consultar informações: An application to easily and quickly access information about countries, cities, and capitals. Explore the world in detail.
translation.O conversor de moedas que criei combina: The currency converter I created combines HTML, CSS3, and JavaScript, along with a currency API, providing users with a practical and intuitive tool for real-time currency conversions.
translation.A Calculadora IMC é uma aplicação simple: The BMI Calculator is a simple application developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that allows you to quickly calculate a person's Body Mass Index (BMI).
translation.Um aplicativo React simples para registr: A simple React application for recording income and expenses, automatically calculating the balance, and displaying an organized list of transactions for effective financial management. Ideal for personal financial control.
translation.O app do tempo que criei é uma aplicação: The weather app I created is a responsive, minimalist, and intuitive web application that uses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to display accurate real-time weather conditions information.
